mapper.select: SELECT food_info_no as foodInfoNo ,food_group as foodGroup ,food_name as foodName ,food_once as foodOnce ,food_kcal as foodKcal ,food_carbohydrate as foodCarbohydrate ,food_protein as foodProtein ,food_fat as foodFat ,food_sugar as foodSugar ,food_natrium as foodNatrium ,food_cholesterol as foodCholesterol ,food_sfa as foodSfa ,food_transfat as foodTransfat ,food_build_year as foodBuildYear FROM food_info
